nodes.text: The Grandmaster Council was the ruling political body of the Gree Enclave. Based on the planet Gree, all planetary councils answered to this body.

The Grandmaster Council was the ruling governing body of the Gree Enclave. Each planet in the Enclave was represented by a grand council; in turn each of these councils sent representatives to the capital planet Gree to sit on the Grandmaster Council. From the capital, the Grandmaster Council oversaw all Gree worlds and were the final authority in political matters.
